function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate cleaning and maintenance of balcony materials may harbor germs and contribute to the spread of diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity of individuals in apartment buildings during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High temperature differentials between day and night in the summer","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited rainfall and dry climate in konya","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliability of questionnaire data","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of cookies for website experience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential exposure to covid-19 due to increased time spent at home","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate balcony spaces considered insufficient for use","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased preference for staying at home due to covid-19 concerns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low social distancing at home during the pandemic period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent leaving of home during the pandemic period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of residences with multiple balconies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Frequent use of balconies for social activities and food storage increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased time spent at home and on balconies during the pandemic may have led to higher exposure to contaminants and air pollutants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of significant difference in regression analysis suggests potential limitations in understanding the impact of demographic factors on health and disease transmission within the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airing clothes on the balcony without proper sanitization may spread contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Arranging a seating area and buying furniture for the balcony may lead to increased social interactions and gatherings, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant relationship between balcony size and changes made during the pandemic process suggests that smaller balconies may face challenges in implementing proper disease prevention measures.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential lack of privacy on balconies due to visibility and distance from neighboring balconies and buildings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Presence of environmental noise and exposure to dust and smoke on balconies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Balconies are commonly used as spaces for food production and processing.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Balconies are important places for natural processing of food, which can pose health risks if not properly managed.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of balconies during the pandemic may lead to higher potential for contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of balconies as a result of the pandemic may lead to crowding and close contact between individuals, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation on small balconies may limit air circulation and increase the risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of sufficient space on balconies may lead to a higher concentration of people in indoor communal areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased intensity of balcony use due to pandemic may lead to higher risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People gathering on balconies increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate quarantine facilities and procedures during 19th-century ottoman empire","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate housing infrastructure for quarantine during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Questioning the use of the balcony in apartments during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 through viral contaminated surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temporary and potentially harmful nature of existing cleaning and disinfectant solutions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of nanotechnology for covid-19 mitigation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incremental rise in research on antimicrobial graphene compounds","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of graphene oxide go as an effective virucide","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of air filtration systems with graphene for virus killing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of unproven technology for virus and bacteria elimination on masks and air filtration systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on carbon-based materials and composites for antiviral properties","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Requirement of laser treatment and sunlight exposure for reusable graphene-coated face masks","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of virucidal chemicals in disinfectant sprays due to their toxicity and adverse effects","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Corrosive nature and residue left by popular disinfectants sodium hypochlorite and hypochlorous acid","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Antibacterial and antiviral surface coatings at high-risk areas in hospitals, schools, and public places","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Breakthrough infections despite vaccine launch","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about future pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact of infectious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of microbial infections, especially sars-cov-2, due to contaminated surfaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Longevity of sars-cov-2 on surfaces, leading to prolonged exposure risk.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on disinfection and killing mechanisms of sars-cov-2 on various surfaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of the virus through airborne aerosols and droplets on various surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
